snippet: In a letter smuggled out of Egypt’s Tora Prison over the weekend, a leading figure in the 2011 uprising who was recently jailed for protesting the current military-backed government, reported that prisoners are routinely tortured.
abstract: In a letter smuggled out of Egypt’s Tora Prison over the weekend, a leading figure in the 2011 uprising who was recently jailed for protesting the current military-backed government, reported that prisoners are routinely tortured.

headline.main: Jailed Leaders of Egypt's 2011 Revolt Describe Beatings

keywords.name: subject
